about.title: Five IT students
about.description1:
Hello everyone! We are a group of five students from ITET Rapisardi - Da Vinci who are about to start their final year of high school. And what better way to conclude our school journey than to create an incredible project together? From our work came HangMan - The Game!
The most famous word-guessing game of all time in a new, interactive, engaging, and inclusive format. The goal? To save Hangy (a 3D reproduction of the hangman game character) from his ominous fate. Select the language, choose the level, and start the game. A display will show you clues for the word to guess. But beware! With each mistake, “Hangy” will automatically lose a piece.
Download the APP and track your progress and your position in the global leaderboard.

gameDescription.title: Game Description
gameDescription.description1:
HangMan is a modernized reinterpretation of the classic hangman game. In this version, the parts progressively fall during the game rather than appearing after each mistake, offering a unique and engaging visual element. The game features various components that contribute to an interactive experience. It is equipped with a microcontroller that manages and controls the game functions. Additionally, there is a touch display that allows users to interact intuitively with the game. The game keyboard has been specially designed by us and provides a unique and engaging way to input letters and guess words. The body is constructed using electromagnets, which contribute to the visual effect of the falling during the game, creating a dynamic and engaging atmosphere.
The game offers the ability to adjust the difficulty and choose the language based on player preferences to customize the gaming experience. All words used are stored in an online database, which offers a wide range of words from various categories. This provides a variety of challenges for players and allows them to explore a vast selection of words.
gameDescription.description2: In addition, the game offers the ability to adjust the difficulty to suit the player's preferences. You can select from several difficulty options to customize the game experience. All words used in the game are stored in an online database, which offers a wide range of words in different categories. This provides a variety of challenges for players and allows them to explore a wide selection of words. In addition, a mode is available that allows players to guess the entire word by entering it directly, rather than attempting it letter by letter. This option offers a quick alternative for those who already have a conclusion in mind or wish to test their ability to find the correct word.
gameDescription.description3: Finally, the base of the game has been 3D printed by us, allowing for complete customization of the shape and design to perfectly fit the remodeled HangMan game.
